Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm relatively new to the forums (aside from the mod download pages ), but I'm just wondering - is there a place where I can like post mission reports and maybe combine them into some whole thing showing my in-game "space agency" and maybe updating it once in a while? I feel like I've seen people do that before, but I just wanted to make sure.

Also, do comments count to this five post rule thing, or only posts? I'm not sure if I need to do 2 more or 4 more after this post...
Welcome to the forum @CessnaSkyhawk, last question first, yes all posts are counted so 2 more and you'll be a full member. We also have a great place to post mission reports here.
Ok. Thanks so much @James Kerman! I'm gonna see about writing up a post with all my missions so far (Just started a new save) later on!
